casebody.data:
OCWEN LOAN SERVICING
v.
REAVES 75P17-3 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017

Ms. Margaret Reaves, For Reaves, Margaret Ann.

Mr. G. Benjamin Milam, Attorney at Law, For Ocwen Loan Servicing, LLC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of September 2017 by Defendant for Petition for Injunction:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
